info.+content: Matsuno household has six naughty and mischievous sons (who are sextuplets), led by the eldest Osomatsu. They were grade schoolers back in the Shōwa period, but despite of still living in the same old household, the street view as well as the life style of modern day society have changed drastically.
#1: "Hanamaru Pippi wa Yoiko Dake" (The Hanamaru Whistle Is Only For Good Kids) by AŌP
#2: "Zenryoku Batankyū" (全力バタンキュー) by AŌP
#1: "Six Same Faces ~Kon'ya wa Saikō!" (SIX SAME FACES ～今夜は最高!!!!!!～) by Kenichi Suzumura, Takahiro Sakurai, Yuichi Nakamura, Hiroshi Kamiya, Jun Fukuyama, Daisuke Ono, & Miyu Irino
#2: "SIX SHAME FACES ~Kon'ya mo Saikō~!!!!!!" (SIX SHAME FACES ～今夜も最高!!!!!!～) by Aya Endo, Kenichi Suzumura, Takahiro Sakurai, Yuichi Nakamura, Hiroshi Kamiya, Jun Fukuyama, Daisuke Ono, & Miyu Irino
